data: ID Community IV Program Antibiotics with High Bioavailability (Module)
For Use By Infectious Disease and Cystic Fibrosis Providers Only
IV form only indicated when: not capable of tolerating oral dosage form, factors affecting oral absorption (ie. GI abnormalities, drug interaction)
400 mg, IV, q12h, Community IV program, drug form: bag, bag
600 mg, IV, q8h, Community IV program, bag,
400 mg, IV, q24h, Community IV program, drug form: bag, bag
500 mg, IV, q12h, Community IV program, drug form: bag, bag
